screens.name: ScreenCheck_if_want_to_sent_Deposit_Inv_to_Customer_or_not
screens.label: Check if want to sent Deposit Inv to Customer or not

fields.name: DTxt_Cash_Customer
fields.fieldText:
The email will be sent to:


Contact Email who Raised Job: {!var_JobData.Contact_Email_who_Raised_Job__c}


The additional email address the estimate will also be sent to is: {!var_JobData.Secondary_Email__c}


*You can choose to amend only the Secondary email via this process

fields.name: RadbtnDo_you_want_to_send_the_Estimate_to_the_Customer
fields.fieldText: Do you want to send the Estimate to the Customer?

screens.name: ScreenCheck_if_want_to_sent_Deposit_Inv_to_Customer_or_not_Credit
screens.label: Check if want to sent Deposit Inv to Customer or not

fields.name: DTxt_Credit_Customer
fields.fieldText:
The Account for this Job is of type {!var_JobData.Account_Type__c} and therefore a deposit is not payable and the Estimate email must/will be sent to the Account 'Email' which is {!var_AccountData.Email__c}


The secondary email address the estimate will also be sent to is: {!var_JobData.Secondary_Email__c}


*You can choose to amend only the Secondary email via this process

fields.name: RadbtnDo_you_want_to_send_the_Estimate_to_the_Customer_Credit
fields.fieldText: Do you want to send the Estimate to the Customer?

screens.name: ScreenContact_Email_who_Raised_Job_is_Null
screens.label: Contact Email who Raised Job is Null

fields.name: DisplayTxtContact_Email_who_Raised_Job_is_Null
fields.fieldText:
The field on the Job record 'Contact Email who Raised Job' is currently blank - we cannot send the email without this.


Please press Finish to exit this process.

fields.name: DisplayTxtCustInvSent_0
fields.fieldText: The Customer has been sent the Estimate via email.

fields.name: DisplayTxtCustInvSent_0_0
fields.fieldText: The Customer has been sent the Estimate via email.

fields.name: DisplayTxtCustInvSent_Credit
fields.fieldText: The {!var_JobData.Account_Type__c} Customer has been sent the Estimate via email.

screens.name: ScreenExit_Selected_confirm_Email_NOT_sent
screens.label: Exit Selected - confirm Email NOT sent

fields.name: DisplayTxt_Selected_confirm_Email_NOT_sent
fields.fieldText: The Estimate has Not been sent to the Customer - please press Finish to exit this process.

screens.name: ScreenExit_Selected_confirm_Email_NOT_sent_Credit
screens.label: Exit Selected - confirm Email NOT sent

fields.name: DisplayTxt_Selected_confirm_Email_NOT_sent_Credit
fields.fieldText: The Estimate has Not been sent to the Customer - please press Finish to exit this process.

screens.name: ScreenJob_Status_is_For_Client_Approval
screens.label: Job Status is For Client Approval

fields.name: DTxt_ReSendEstimate
fields.fieldText:
The Estimate has already been sent to the Customer as the Job Status is {!var_JobData.Status__c}.


If you re-send it, the email will be sent to:


Contact Email who Raised Job: {!var_JobData.Contact_Email_who_Raised_Job__c}


The additional email address the estimate will also be sent to is: {!var_JobData.Secondary_Email__c}


*You can choose to amend only the Secondary email via this process

fields.name: RadbtnDo_you_want_to_send_the_Estimate_to_the_Customer_ReSend
fields.fieldText: Do you want to re-send the Estimate to the Customer?
